item.title: Costa Maya Shore Excursion: Chacchoben Day Trip
item.description: Disembark your cruise ship at the port of Casa Maya and embark on a shore excursion to the ancient Mayan city of Chacchoben. Discover the mystifying archeological site as you admire colossal pyramids and sacred temples that were only discovered in the late 20th century. Experience the diverse wildlife of the surrounding jungle as your knowledgeable guide offers a captivating commentary of the atmospheric ruins. Round-trip transport from the port in an air-conditioned minivan is included in the tour.

image.alt: Costa Maya Shore Excursion: Chacchoben Day Trip

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins from Costa Maya
item.description: This small-group tour of the Chacchoben Maya Ruins—one of the most popular attractions near Costa Maya—also offers an optional trip to a beach club. Meet your guide near the port in Costa Maya and head out to the archeological site, which you’ll explore for roughly 1.5 hours. On the return journey, stop at a beach club at Playa Mahahual (optional) before drop-off.

image.alt: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins from Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: One Day Tour to Chacchoben Mayan City and Bacalar Lagoon with a Certified Guide
item.description: Discover Mexico's ancient Mayan history and beautiful landscapes during this shore excursion from the Costa Maya dock. First, head to the Chacchoben archaeological site for a guided tour of the ancient Mayan site that dates back to 200 BC. Then, head to Bacalar Lagoon, famous for its colorful waters, and enjoy time to swim, sunbathe, or even kayak.

image.alt: One Day Tour to Chacchoben Mayan City and Bacalar Lagoon with a Certified Guide

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Bacalar – 7 Colors Lagoon Excursión Costa Maya
item.description: The Bacalar Lagoon was once a haven for Caribbean pirates but has become one of the Yucatan's most beautiful places to visit. Join a small group and take a guided tour from Costa Maya to the 7-colored lagoon for a day of swimming and exploring. Visit the Cocalitos and Black cenotes as well as the Pirate Channel, where precious wood was once smuggled.

image.alt: Bacalar – 7 Colors Lagoon Excursión Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Chacchoben & Bacalar Combo Excursion Costa Maya
item.description: Combine two top attractions while on shore at Costa Maya. Get picked up at the cruise port and travel by air-conditioned vehicle to the historic Mayan ruins at Cacchoben, which date to 200BC. Afterwards, head to Bacalar Lagoon, also know as the Seven Colors Lagoon, with stops at Cenote Emeralda, Black Cenote and the infamous Pirates Channel. Also included are lunch, snacks, water and alcoholic beverages.

image.alt: Chacchoben & Bacalar Combo Excursion Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Snorkel boat tour in search of turtles
item.description: Enjoy snorkeling in the calm and protected waters of a shallow reef lagoon. Visit two different snorkeling areas, both just a short boat ride away from Mahahual. Look for turtles, tropical fish and coral in the water. Snorkeling guides are on hand to provide assistance if needed, perfect for those with limited snorkeling experience.

image.alt: Snorkel boat tour in search of turtles

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Private beach, all inclusive.
item.description:
Forget the crowds. We only admit 35 people per day.
The private beach of ¨Xahuayxol¨ is located 27 km away from the Costa Maya port, or 35 minutes by car and this is one of the most beautiful beaches in the Caribbean.
You will have food, drinks and transportation included. You will be able to enjoy Mexican food, you can drink all drinks with or without alcohol. The name of the place is ¨Xahuayxol¨, which is a word in the Mayan language, which means ¨garden in the sea¨, this is because it is surrounded by the barrier reef, which you can get to know in one of our kayaks and snorkel.

image.alt: Private beach, all inclusive.

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins with Local Experience Costa Maya Excursion
item.description: Explore the ancient Mayan ruins of Chacchoben on a guided tour from Costa Maya. Meet your guide at a central location in Mahahual, just outside the cruise port and travel together to Chacchoben, one of the least explored Mayan sites in Mexico. Walk through the jungle and see important structures at the sites including different temples, along with local flora and fauna.

image.alt: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins with Local Experience Costa Maya Excursion

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: One Day Bacalar Seven Color Lagoon Adventure with transportation and Lunch
item.description: Visit Bacalar, commonly known as the 'Seven Color Lagoon,' with this adventure, which includes round-trip transportation from right by the Costa Maya port. You'll take a guided kayaking tour through the waters, spend time swimming and hiking, and get the chance to dine on an included fajita lunch as you look out over the lagoon.

image.alt: One Day Bacalar Seven Color Lagoon Adventure with transportation and Lunch

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: CHACCHOBEN Ruins and BACALAR Lagoon Boat Excursion from Costa Maya
item.description: Have a fun day out exploring both an ancient city, Chacchoben, and also one of the prettiest lagoons in Mexico, the Bacalar Lagoon. You’ll keep costs down by booking this group tour, but still have plenty of time to enjoy each site as you like. Along the way, you’ll also have lunch provided, as well as beer and tequila available, in case you want to have a few drinks along the way.

image.alt: CHACCHOBEN Ruins and BACALAR Lagoon Boat Excursion from Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: 2 Tank Dive (for certified divers)
item.description: Scuba dive Mahahual to discover the vibrant coral and marine wildlife of the Mesoamerican Barrier Reef. This dive trip for PADI-certified divers is an excellent introduction to Mahahual diving, with two included tanks and boat transport to dive sites along the barrier reef. Prebooking secures your spot on the boat, avoiding delays so you can spend even more time in the water.

image.alt: 2 Tank Dive (for certified divers)

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Costa maya local guide
item.description: Take a break from tanning on the beach and discover the ancient Mayan ruins of Chacchobén on this half-day excursion. Go deep into the jungle to visit these 8th century ruins and learn about the Mayans who built the pyramids. After your guided tour, shop for local handicrafts, then return to the starting point.

image.alt: Costa maya local guide

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Two tanks local diving for certified divers, SCUBA gear included
item.description: Enjoy a hassle-free scuba diving experience in the clear waters off Costa Maya with this small-group diving tour from Mahahual for certified divers. Experience two dives around the Mahahual reef from the boat, with a choice of five dive sites, and relax during the surface interval at the beach. All equipment provided.

image.alt: Two tanks local diving for certified divers, SCUBA gear included

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: BACALAR Seven Color Lagoon Boat Excursion from Costa Maya
item.description: Bacalar is known for its spectacular lagoon, which is nicknamed “the lake of seven colors”, due to its ever-changing shades of blue. See the beauty of this natural wonder up close by exploring it from aboard a boat. No need to worry about bringing food with you as a healthy fruit snack, alcoholic drinks, soft drinks, and a taco lunch are included.

image.alt: BACALAR Seven Color Lagoon Boat Excursion from Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Discovery Scuba Dive.
item.description: If you're interested in scuba diving but still not sure whether it's for you, this introductory three-hour scuba course will give you a taste and help you decide. Your PADI-certified instructor will introduce you to the gear and begin with a theory course. Then, practice in shallow water, followed by a deeper dive for up to 40 minutes. This is a fun way to learn new skills.

image.alt: Discovery Scuba Dive.

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins Excursion
item.description: Explore one of southern Quintana Roo’s most popular archaeological sites on this half-day tour to Chacchoben. Avoid the hassle of finding your own way there and back with round-trip transportation via air-conditioned vehicle from Costa Maya. Learn about Mayan history and culture from your guide as you explore, and take in scenic views of the surrounding jungle.

image.alt: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins Excursion

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: PADI Discover Scuba Diving
item.description: Try out scuba diving without having to be certified first with this Discover Scuba Diving course in Mahahual. Learn the basics of theory and technique, test out your new skills in confined water, then enjoy a dive in open water accompanied a PADI dive instructor. No experience necessary, all the equipment you need is provided.

image.alt: PADI Discover Scuba Diving

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Day excursion to a PRIVATE LUXURY BEACH CLUB with transportation.
item.description: Escape the crowds while in Costa Maya by spending your time at a private beach club. After your ship docks, your designated driver will take you from the cruise port to the secluded beach at Hayhu Beach Club. Relax on your private deck with private bathroom and shower, while enjoying personalized food and drink service. Swim, snorkel, kayak or paddleboard in the ocean. Or enjoy land activities like board games, soccer and volleyball.

image.alt: Day excursion to a PRIVATE LUXURY BEACH CLUB with transportation.

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins and Bacalar Lagoon Combo Tour from Costa Maya
item.description:
Explore the best of Costa Maya in one unforgettable cruise excursion!
Step off your cruise ship and embark on a journey through time, from the ancient Mayans to notorious pirates. Discover an off-the-beaten-path archaeological site dating back to 200 BC, hidden deep in the jungle. Be awed by the remarkable monuments, lush flora, and diverse wildlife that the jungle has to offer.
After your jungle adventure and exploring the Mayan city of Chacchoben, we'll take you to the famous Bacalar Lagoon, once a pirate's paradise. Here, you can unwind, swim, or enjoy a relaxing kayak ride in the crystal-clear waters of the stunning seven-color lagoon.
Take a break and savor delicious fajitas and your favorite beverage by the lagoon's edge while soaking in the breathtaking scenery and cool breeze.
This tour is a must for first-time visitors to Costa Maya, offering the perfect blend of culture, history, and adventure.

image.alt: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins and Bacalar Lagoon Combo Tour from Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Salsa & Salsa cooking lessons + Beach day
item.description: Do you want to learn to make authentic Mexican salsas and guacamole, drink margaritas and learn how to dance salsa on the beach? Then this is the tour for you! Stop at a Beach mexican Restaurant La Chilangaloense with a beautiful view for a hand's-on cooking class.Your guide will take you through the steps of making authentic Mexican salsas and guacamole from the freshest ingredients. You'll have tortilla chips to taste your creations and can take the recipes home with you.Quench your thirst with complimentary margaritas, Mexican beer, or flavored waters. Afterwards, your guide will show you how to step, sway and get into the groove of Latin America's most famous dance- the Salsa! Follow step-by step instructions and you'll soon be ready for the dance floor. After your class, you'll have free time to enjoy the beach break. When time's up, you have the option to either return to your ship or stay at Beach Club and extend your day in this tropical paradise.

image.alt: Salsa & Salsa cooking lessons + Beach day

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Mahahual and Costa Maya Birdwatching
item.description: The Yucatán Peninsula is home to a rich variety of birds that even experienced birdwatchers have a hard time spotting. On this tour, explore the jungle, mangroves, and grasslands with a guide who helps you find the elusive birds. Get personal attention from your guide and don’t stress about packing lunch, as it’s included.

image.alt: Mahahual and Costa Maya Birdwatching

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: CRUISE GUEST Electric Bike
item.description: Make the most of your cruise ship stop and explore more of Mahahual and Costa Maya with an electric bike. Save time by pre-booking your bike rental, which will be ready for pickup when your cruise ship docks in Costa Maya cruise port. Create your own itinerary and go where you want, at your own pace with your electric bike rental.

image.alt: CRUISE GUEST Electric Bike

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Costa Maya Sport Fishing
item.description: The waters off Costa Maya are teeming with plenty of pelagic and resident fish, including barracuda, mahi mahi, Spanish mackerel, wahoo, tuna, and more. This private charter provides everything you need to enjoy a day of fishing off Mahahual, including fishing boat and all fishing tackle. Enjoy trolling, jigging, and even fly fishing, and spend time at a beach club afterwards, enjoying your catch.

image.alt: Costa Maya Sport Fishing

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Ancient Chacchoben Mayan Ruins & Mayan Experience from Costa Maya
item.description: Combine a tour of the ancient Mayan ruins of Chacchoben with a visit with a Mayan family on this guided tour from Costa Maya. Travel from the cruise port by air-conditioned vehicle to Chacchoben Mayan Ruins for a guided tour. Afterwards, pay a visit to a Mayan family in Chacchoben Village. Learn about traditional medicines and how to make a traditional tortilla, then sample traditional dishes from recipes passed down through the generations.

image.alt: Ancient Chacchoben Mayan Ruins & Mayan Experience from Costa Maya

item.location: Costa Maya, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan
